title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. H, art. 2, pt. 378 - Medical Proof Of Disability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. H, art. 2, pt. 378 - Medical Proof Of Disability

State Regulations
§ 378.1 - Statutory requirement for medical statement of disability

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 12, ch. V, subch. H, art. 2, pt. 378

Statutory authority: Workers' Compensation Law, §§ 117, 141, 211, 241

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
